thread.title: HEATHER JEANNE

author: HEATHER JEANNE
title: HEATHER JEANNE
text:
This is the second time that I've had the pleasure of being assisted with my travel plans by Garima. Because of the incredible job she did 6 months ago for me I decided to use Trip. Beam again for my next tour to India. Once again, Garima was kind, courteous, personable, and very professional! It is because of Garima that I will always use Trip Beam as my travel agency for my India tours. Thanks Garima!!
!
